text: (napiye!) Allah tan atiyarkalukkaka alittirukkum (atai) alankarattaiyum, nalla (melana) unavaiyum (akatavai enru) tatuppavar yar?'' Enak kettu, â€˜â€˜atu ivvulakattil nampikkai kontavarkalukku(m akumanate! Eninum) marumai nalil (avarkalukku mattume) contamanatu'' enru kuruviraka. Ariyakkutiya makkalukku (namatu) vacanankalai ivvaru vivarikkirom
